unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Is Your Insta Game Strong, Yaar?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Is Your Insta Game Strong, Yaar?**

unnormalised: Mumbai: Are you a budding influencer like Bhuvan Bam or Prajakta Koli, or a brand trying to crack the Indian market? Then listen up! New follower analytics tools are popping up faster than chai stalls on a Churchgate street.
normalised: Mumbai: Are you a budding influencer like Bhuvan Bam or Prajakta Koli, or a brand trying to crack the Indian market? Then listen up! New follower analytics tools are popping up faster than chai stalls on a Churchgate street.

unnormalised: These tools give you the real juice – beyond just the follower count. Think demographics, engagement rates (likes, comments, shares – the whole shebang!), and even where your fans are geographically located (Delhi, Bangalore, Kolkata – the works!).
normalised: These tools give you the real juice – beyond just the follower count. Think demographics, engagement rates (likes, comments, shares – the whole shebang!), and even where your fans are geographically located (Delhi, Bangalore, Kolkata – the works!).

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIM Ahmedabad says, "Understanding your audience is key. You wouldn't sell winter coats in Chennai, would you? Same principle applies online."
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I M Ahmedabad says, "Understanding your audience is key. You wouldn't sell winter coats in Chennai, would you? Same principle applies online."

unnormalised: These analytics platforms help you tailor your content, target ads effectively, and measure ROI. One tool even claims to analyze sentiment, so you know if your latest meme bombed or became the next viral sensation.
normalised: These analytics platforms help you tailor your content, target ads effectively, and measure R O I. One tool even claims to analyze sentiment, so you know if your latest meme bombed or became the next viral sensation.

unnormalised: Prices range from free (for basic stuff) to Rs. 5,000 per month (for the premium, bells-and-whistles version). Some offer insights like identifying fake followers, a common problem especially in areas with low digital literacy. Think of it as cleaning your 1,000 sq ft apartment – only it's your digital presence! So, ditch the guesswork and get analyzing!
normalised: Prices range from free (for basic stuff) to rupee five thousand per month (for the premium, bells-and-whistles version). Some offer insights like identifying fake followers, a common problem especially in areas with low digital literacy.
